question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array by index?
Which data structure uses First-In-First-Out (FIFO) principle?
What is the default value of an `int` variable in Java if not initialized?
Which of the following is not a linear data structure?
Which of the following methods is used to compare two strings in Java?

options: Adds 1 and 2 to the stack, then removes 1
Adds 1 and 2 to the stack, then removes 2
Removes both elements from the stack
answer: Adds 1 and 2 to the stack, then removes 2

question: In which data structure is insertion and deletion performed at one end only?
Which of the following is a property of a binary search tree (BST)?
options: Left child is greater than root
Right child is smaller than root
All nodes are sorted in increasing order
Left child is smaller, right child is greater
answer: Left child is smaller, right child is greater

question: What is the purpose of the `final` keyword in Java?
options: To allow modification of a variable
